component.description: Dialog is a panel component overlaying other elements. Dialog avoids popup blockers, provides customization, resizing, modality, ajax interactions and more.

attribute.name: header
attribute.description: Text of the header.

attribute.name: draggable
attribute.description: Specifies draggability. Default is true.

attribute.name: resizable
attribute.description: Specifies resizability. Default is true.

attribute.name: modal
attribute.description: Boolean value that specifies whether the document should be shielded with a partially transparent mask to require the user to close the Panel before being able to activate any elements in the document. Default is false.

attribute.name: visible
attribute.description: Sets dialogs visibility. Default is false.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: Width of the dialog in pixels. Default is auto.

attribute.name: height
attribute.description: Height of the dialog.

attribute.name: minWidth
attribute.description: Minimum width of a resizable dialog. Default is unl.

attribute.name: minHeight
attribute.description: Minimum height of a resizable dialog. Default is height of titlebar.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Inline style of the dialog container.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the dialog container.

attribute.name: showEffect
attribute.description: Effect to use when showing the dialog.

attribute.name: hideEffect
attribute.description: Effect to use when hiding the dialog.

attribute.name: position
attribute.description: Defines where the dialog should be displayed.

attribute.name: closable
attribute.description: Defines if close icon should be displayed or not.

attribute.name: onShow
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when dialog is displayed.

attribute.name: onHide
attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when dialog is hidden.

attribute.name: appendToBody
attribute.description: Appends dialog as a child of document body.

attribute.name: showHeader
attribute.description: Specifies visibility of header content.

attribute.name: footer
attribute.description: Text of the footer.

attribute.name: dynamic
attribute.description: Dynamic mode allows dialog to fetch it's contents before it's shown rather than on page load which is useful to reduce initial page load times. Default is false.

attribute.name: minimizable
attribute.description: Specifies if dialog is minimizable or not. Default false.

attribute.name: maximizable
attribute.description: Specifies if dialog is maximizable or not. Default false.
